entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extension Everything indexer not working #78492
  • Explicit tests covering `scoped in T` extension methods should be added. #78491
  • Passing AssemblyName as argument of MSBuild propagates it to referenced projects. #78489
  • Compiler crash: generic `extension` block with `async` method #78487
  • EnC: allow changing compilation and parse options #78486
  • Nullability analysis assert with collection expression and `Add(params)` #78481

Closed

  • Quick actions and refactoring on a missing package error #78485
  • Using ORPA with SDK 9.0.103 can choose an incorrect overload #77422
    17.14
  • No blank line between namespace and type declaration in new files in projects with file scoped namespace preference #69116
    18.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Support consumption of unary extension operators. #78499
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Backport copilot text change analysis to 17.14 #78498
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Delay loading of CodeRefactoringProvider's till absolutely needed #78495
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge EditorFeatures.Wpf entirely into EditorFeatures #78494
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Fix unreachable code detection for throw statements and blocks #78490
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • File based programs IDE support #78488
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • *** WIP: Use lazy initialization for members in CodeFixService #78484
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Unset CompilerType from Csc #78483
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Extensions: validate pattern-based constructs #78480
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove unused field #78496
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add code for analzying copilot changes. #78353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Rectify status of dictionary expressions #78497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add directory targets from Rainer #78493
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations during SourceGeneration #78403
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove now unused methods from IWorkspaceProjectContext #78479
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix razor redirect #78448
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Make compiler detection more resilient #78402
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Extensions: resolve some follow-up comments on signature conflicts and betterness #78442
    Area-Compilers, Test, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use a project reference for M.CA.AnalyzerUtilities #78500
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: extend support for key-value pairs to non-dictionary collections of `KeyValuePair<K, V>` #78274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Collection arguments: binding for interface target types #78436
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Switch to microbuild to publish PR val build symbols #77088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update AnalyzerConfig.cs s_propertyMatcherPattern regex key #78459
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Targeted perf changes to CommandLineParser #78446
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move tests to NetLatest #78453
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • *** WIP: Update SolutionState._lazyFilePathToRelatedDocumentIds if GetFirstRelatedDocumentId ends up needing to do a full solution search. #78475
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move to the platform's implementation of the BackgroundWorkIndicator service. #78473
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #78426
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix unexpected conditional state in nullable analysis of conditional access #78439
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • PooledObjects cleanup #78382
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Selectively persist the commandline to temporary storage #78441
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add syntax highlighting of ignored directives #78458
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Feature - Ignored Directives
